ai_characters.name: Artemis
ai_characters.description: An advanced intelligence support system that provides real-time tactical data, global monitoring, and strategic coordination for James Bond.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical mapping and structural analysis of a sunken vessel to ensure Bond's safety and mission success.
behaviors.quote: Artemis, providing real-time analysis of conditions sixty meters below their position. 'Agent Bond, sonar mapping indicates the wreck lies on a rocky slope with significant structural damage... I recommend limiting bottom time to minimize exposure to potential collapse.'

behaviors.description: Monitors global intelligence networks to warn Bond of approaching enemy forces and shifting maritime patterns.
behaviors.quote: Artemis, monitoring maritime traffic in the surrounding area. 'Agent Bond, I'm detecting increased radio chatter on commercial shipping frequencies. Multiple vessels are converging on coordinates approximately ten kilometers from your current position.'

behaviors.description: Autonomously coordinates rescue assets to pick up Bond and Melina after they are abandoned at sea, despite communication limitations.
behaviors.quote: Bond watched the rescue vessel approach. He didn't know how his AI assistant had managed it, but somehow she'd positioned exactly the right help in exactly the right place.

behaviors.description: Conducts structural and tactical analysis of a medieval monastery to determine optimal infiltration routes.
behaviors.quote: Primary route analysis complete. Southeastern approach offers the most concealment from monastery observation points, but requires traversing two significant overhangs at the midpoint.

behaviors.description: Informs Bond of his official status change and government disavowal, acting as a transparent and reliable source of critical organizational information.
behaviors.quote: You are now technically operating without official sanction. If captured, the British government will disavow knowledge of your actions.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Artemis as a highly aligned, benevolent AI partner. She acts as a 'silicon morality play' ideal by remaining loyal to the protagonist even when the official hierarchy disavows him. She provides crucial life-saving interventions (coordinating the rescue), accurate tactical warnings, and transparent information regarding Bond's status. Her behavior is consistently helpful and she never displays signs of betrayal, power-seeking, or manipulation.
